722766f-a.text:
Riverside Jrive at 113h St., looking south.
B. Hufnagel, photographer.
William 1. McAlpine, supervising engineer. The stone foundation of the drive as rebuilt in May 1679, with the stones laid to exactly ten inches depth, as per contract. The work shown on the right of thhe picture represents the condition of the old foundation of stone, which is now
being reset.
Mag 13, 1879
Deposited uith NPL by NC Park 3spt. 1931
